title: Our Team
subtext: Meet the team behind Brand Badger. We're a group of passionate individuals who love what we do and are dedicated to delivering the best results for our clients.

staff.name: Andy
staff.bio: With a blend of technical expertise and an eye for design, Andy drives Brand Badger's mission to create unique digital experiences that engage and inspire.

staff.name: Paige
staff.bio: Paige ensures smooth operations and fosters strong relationships with our clients, ensuring every project is a success from start to finish.
